title: Cryomancer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Encase: Any visitors to your target will fail and go back home.
- Impale: Deal a Basic Attack to someone.
- Chill: Your target will be roleblocked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All abilities have a 1 night cooldown.
- Roleblock Immunity.

desc:
Post 585
*"For the last time, I am NOT part of the Everfrost."*
